alert.note: Alert for Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 11:57AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sedgwick County through 1230 PM CDT... At 1156 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Andover, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Derby, Andover, Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Maize, Sedgwick, Downtown Wichita, Kechi, Eastborough, Bentley, East Wichita, Northeast Wichita, Mcconnell Air Force Base, Oaklawn and Jabara Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 3 and 22. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 44 and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
